sms.en: âœ‰ï¸ SMS You can send 10 SMS daily to any Ncell number for free and paid SMS for Rs. 1.20 per SMS. Unlike Ncell App, the text is not limited to 160 characters. You can send upto 1000 characters at once.ğŸ˜‰ Note that paid SMS won't use your SMS packs but deduct the balance instead.
